name: Zombie Madness
description:
Zombie Madness is a single player role-playing game (RPG), a player play as a security guard in an epic struggle for survival against swarming zombie hordes and terrifying mutant monsters. This game has 5 different levels. Level 1 is in the parking lot and continues to the shopping mall in level 2. Level 3 is in dungeon and continues to level 4, his home street. The final level is inside the house which is the level 5.

This game is just a prototype.

I made this game for the first time in my life for my school project. I upload it because I am proud of what I just did. :D
